closed.title: Emergency Maintenance | Western Cape
closed.description: Afrihost is conducting emergency maintenance on our network equipment in Cape Town. Clients in the Western Cape might experience some intermittent connection. The maintenance will be completed by 05:00am on the 23rd of March 2023. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

closed.title: Vumatel Outage | Northern Region

updates.content:
Outage includes the following areas and areas surrounding

    -Atlasville
    -Brakpan Central
    -Casseldale
    -Crystal Park
    -Dalview
    -Farramere
    -Impala Park
    -Northmead
    -Parkrand
    -Rynfield
    -Selection Park
    -Sunward Park
